alert.note: Alert for Boone County Except Southwest; Boone County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 5:18PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Boone County through 545 PM CDT... At 517 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Roberson Hollow, or 12 miles northwest of Harrison, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Harrison... Bergman... Omaha... Myrtle... Roberson Hollow... Capps... Self... Red Bank... Alpena... Batavia... Bear Creek Springs... Hopewell in Boone County... Ridgeway... Burlington... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Boone County Except Southwest; Boone County Higher Elevations
